title: anthro{dendum}
description: A group blog devoted to ‘doing anthropology in public’ — providing well-written relevant discussion of sociocultural anthropology that everyone will find accessible.

title: THR Web Features | Web Features | The Hedgehog Review
Zettelkasten knowledge and info management
description: A Zettelkasten is a personal tool for thinking and writing that creates an interconnected web of thought. Its emphasis is on connection and not mere collection of ideas.
